summary.default: 14 years shipping mobile apps. React Native, Swift, Kotlin. CI/CD pipelines that actually work. Apps with 500K+ users (McDonald's Canada, Wave Financial). Currently building wallet infrastructure for Bittensor.

templates.mobile: 14 years of iOS and Android. Native Swift, Kotlin, and cross-platform React Native. Built CI/CD for daily and on-demand releases - OTA deployments that are predictable, not prayers. Shipped apps to 500K+ users. Currently deep in Expo, Rust FFI, and crypto wallet UX.
templates.leadership: 14 years shipping mobile apps, 5 years leading teams. Mentored engineers, ran code reviews, built CI/CD that freed devs to focus on product instead of fighting builds. Shipped apps with 500K+ users. Led migrations, established testing practices, kept releases predictable.
templates.architect: 14 years of mobile architecture decisions. Monorepos, modular builds, CI/CD for daily and on-demand delivery. Migrated codebases to TypeScript, integrated Rust via FFI, designed OTA pipelines that actually work. From REST to GraphQL to gRPC - whatever the API needs.
